oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Sagebrush Roundup - 1939-mm-dd - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WMMN's Sagebrush Roundup radio program, part 2. Featuring the Hickory Nuts (Jimmy James, Mary Ann Estes, Enoch 'Eli' Haney), Salt & Peanuts (Frank Salt, Margaret McConnell, Buddy Frank), the Boys From Kentucky (Curley Wellman, Bob Shortridge, Charlie 'Big Foot' Keaton), Buddy & Smiley (Buddy Starcher, Smiley Sutter), Ted Grant, and unidentified performers 'Pete' and 'Noel'.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hickory Nuts; Salt & Peanuts; Charlie 'Big Foot' Keaton; Ted Grant; Buddy Starcher
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Announcer talks about a sponsor offer -- MC introduces the Hickory Nuts -- Arrowana (Hickory Nuts) -- MC introduces Salt & Peanuts -- The Bear Went Over The Mountain (Salt & Peanuts) -- MC introduces 'Big Foot', Ted, Pete, and Noel -- Memories (Charlie 'Big Foot' Keaton, Ted Grant, Pete, Noel) -- MC introduces Buddy Starcher -- I Wish It Wasn't So (Buddy Starcher) -- Kolor-Vak commercial
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WMMN (Radio station : Fairmont, W. Va.); Sagebrush roundup (Radio program); Hickory Nuts (Musical group); James, Jimmy, 1912-; Starcher, Mary Ann Estes; Haney, Enoch; Salt & Peanuts (Musical group); Kurtz, Frank; McConnell, Margaret (Musical group : Salt & Peanuts); Frank, Buddy; Boys From Kentucky (Musical group); Wellman, Curley; Shortridge, Bob; Keaton, Charlie Big Foot; Buddy & Smiley (Musical group); Starcher, Buddy, 1906-2001; Sutter, Smilie, 1915-; Grant, Ted (Violinist)
